OnlineUsers.description: Settings related to the online users feature.

Enable.description: Enable or disable the online users feature. This is used to indicate the number of online users in the backoffice and display their names.

Sounds.description: Settings related to the sounds played for user login and logout events.

Enable.description: Enable or disable the audio notifications for user login and logout events.

LoginSound.description: Path to the login sound file. This can be a relative path or an absolute URL.

LogoutSound.description: Path to the logout sound file. This can be a relative path or an absolute URL.
